summary: Implemented MCS-restricted truth lemma with key theorem mcs_semantic_truth_iff_in_mcs (sorry-free). Discovered fundamental architectural limitation: box semantics quantify over ALL histories, preventing full truth_at to semantic_truth_at_v2 correspondence. The existing semantic_weak_completeness remains sorry-free and provides practical completeness.

artifacts.summary: MCS-derived world state subtype with sorry-free truth correspondence lemmas
Implementation summary documenting achievements and architectural limitations

metadata.architectural_limitation: Box semantics quantify over ALL histories, not just MCS-derived ones

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented MCSDerivedSemanticWorldState subtype and proved mcs_semantic_truth_iff_in_mcs (semantic truth equals MCS membership for MCS-derived states). Discovered and documented fundamental limitation: box operator semantics prevent full truth lemma due to quantification over all histories.
